updateImageDesc1: You can update your application's Docker image to offer an up-to-date version of your service. Updates are incremental and uninterrupted. You keep your current configuration, such as your HTTP endpoint or deployment strategy.
updateImageDesc2: Please provide a different tag so that the Docker image update is taken into account.
imageInfo: Enter the path to your Docker image. Images hosted on a private or public registry are accepted (GitHub, GitLab, DockerHub, etc.)
